About Me

Featured Projects

Project Spiderbot

-ROS        -Gazebo
-RViz        -Fusion360
-Hardware build and assembly
-Inverse Kinematics

Spiderbot is a biomimetic quadruped robot, which follows the creep gait to move like a spider. It is used as a testing platform for control algorithms.

Check it out

Self-excited Biped mechanism analysis

-Self-Excitation
-Biped Locomotion and Balance
-Fusion360

This project aims to study self-excited walking of four-link biped mechanisms which are actuated at hip joints and passive at knee joints with stoppers.

Check it out

Motion Planning of Legged Robots using Deep-RL

-Reinforcement Learning

Researching on the motion planning of different legged robots on legged terrains, and using RL for the Robot to learn Locomotion on different terrains.

Check it out

Motion of a racecar on a complicated Track

-Python        -OpenCV
-Robot Path planning     
-Control        -Gazebo

The task was to code an algorithm to simulate the motion of a racecar on an arbitrary Racetrack, making sure the car doesn't deviate from the path.

Smart Vision Analysis

-Machine learnning
-Neuroscience

This project is related to neuroscience and explores brain computer interfacing. It aims to analyse the reception of images and colors to the brain to Improve computer vision techniques.

Project Holter Monitor

-Circuit design
-Arduino Coding

Project Holter monitor is to make a cost efficient heart rate monitor which can be simply worn on the body and helps measure heart rate anytime at a regular basis. The key feature of this project is its cost efficiency compared to industrial products.

Check it out
